title: Topic 001 Question 163
body: You have developed a containerized web application that will serve internal colleagues during business hours. You want to ensure that no costs are incurred outside of the hours the application is used. You have just created a new Google Cloud project and want to deploy the application. What should you do?
options: Deploy the container on Cloud Run for Anthos, and set the minimum number of instances to zero.
Deploy the container on Cloud Run (fully managed), and set the minimum number of instances to zero.
Deploy the container on App Engine flexible environment with autoscaling, and set the value min_instances to zero in the app.yaml.
Deploy the container on App Engine flexible environment with manual scaling, and set the value instances to zero in the app.yaml.
